net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.impl

Class PresenceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.managers.impl.PresenceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Presence

    public class PresenceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Presence
    The Presence associated with the provided JDA instance
    Note that this does not automatically handle the 5/60 second rate limit!
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Florian Spie√ü

        This might not be what the Discord Client displays due to session clashing!

        public Game getGame()

        This might not be what the Discord Client displays due to session clashing!
        Specified by:
        getGame in interface Presence
        Returns:

      • isIdle

        public boolean isIdle()
        Description copied from interface: Presence
        Whether the current session is marked as afk or not.

        This is relevant to client accounts to monitor whether new messages should trigger mobile push-notifications.

        Specified by:
        isIdle in interface Presence
        Returns:
        True if this session is marked as afk

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(OnlineStatus status)
        Description copied from interface: Presence
        Sets the OnlineStatus for this session
        Specified by:
        setStatus in interface Presence
        Parameters:
        status - the OnlineStatus to be used (OFFLINE/null -> INVISIBLE)

      • setGame

        public void setGame(Game game)
        Description copied from interface: Presence
        Sets the Game for this session.
        A Game can be retrieved via Game.playing(String). For streams you provide a valid streaming url as second parameter

        Examples:
        presence.setGame(Game.playing("Thrones"));
        presence.setGame(Game.streaming("Thrones", "https://twitch.tv/EasterEggs"));

        Specified by:
        setGame in interface Presence
        Parameters:
        game - A Game instance or null to reset
        See Also:
        Game.playing(String), Game.streaming(String, String)

      • setIdle

        public void setIdle(boolean idle)
        Description copied from interface: Presence
        Sets whether this session should be marked as afk or not

        This is relevant to client accounts to monitor whether new messages should trigger mobile push-notifications.

        Specified by:
        setIdle in interface Presence
        Parameters:
        idle - boolean

      • setPresence

        public void setPresence(OnlineStatus status,
                        Game game,
                        boolean idle)
        Description copied from interface: Presence
        Sets all presence fields of this session.
        Specified by:
        setPresence in interface Presence
        Parameters:
        status - The OnlineStatus for this session (See Presence.setStatus(OnlineStatus))
        game - The Game for this session (See Presence.setGame(Game) for more info)
        idle - Whether to mark this session as idle (useful for client accounts Presence.setIdle(boolean))

      • setPresence

        public void setPresence(OnlineStatus status,
                        Game game)
        Description copied from interface: Presence

        The third field stays untouched.
